ygData.msgSnippet: hiya for me to see the maps.  I have to download them to a directory then open them this way. i open my MS-word  then open a new document then INSERT  picture
ygData.messageBody:
hiya
for me to see the maps. I have to download them to a directory then
open
them this way. i open my MS-word then open a new document
then INSERT picture from FILE then click on its tabs to resize it.
heh i know it is a pain but i am on windows NT and i dont have
security to install neat graphic viewers on my work PC LOL
Doublestar
